text: "Cold, Cold Heart" is a 1951 song and written by Hank Williams and was covered by Tony Bennett as a pop version in the same year. It went to number 1 on the country single chart and Bennett's version went to number 1 in the United States. ==References== Category:1951 songs Category:Country pop songs Category:Hank Williams songs Category:Tony Bennett songs Category:The Fontane Sisters songs Category:Jerry Lee Lewis songs Category:Glen Campbell songs Category:George Jones songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Bill Haley songs Category:Norah Jones songs Category:Clint Black songs Category:Frankie Laine songs
title: Cold, Cold Heart
